text: We've followed Luann de Lesseps'journey this season of The Real Housewives of New York City, from her divorce from Tom D'Agostino to her Palm Beach arrest and subsequent stay in rehab to her triumphant cabaret debut. But as anyone who's been following the news knows, Luann's journey has continued beyond the Season 10 finale. The RHONY cabaret performer checked herself back into an alcohol treatment center in July, right before the taping of this season's reunion. As a result, Luann was not present for the sit - down, the second part of which aired Wednesday night.
